H0.text: The badge/logo of which car is a circle with a three-pointed star in the centre. Acura

H1.text: The badge/logo of which car is a circle with a three-pointed star in the centre. Audi

H2.text: The badge/logo of which car is a circle with a three-pointed star in the centre. BMW

H3.text: The badge/logo of which car is a circle with a three-pointed star in the centre. M-B

A4.text: Daimler Motoren Gesellschaft (DMG) registered a three-pointed star as a trademark in 1909.

A5.text: The three-pointed star symbolized Gottlieb Daimler's aims for universal motorization.
